ygData.subject: Re: weapons upgrade?
ygData.msgSnippet: Also of note for all you dark races out there. The Grobb Cleaver is easily obtained is comparable to a shiny brass halberd for damage but has 3 stat bonuses.
ygData.messageBody:
Also of note for all you dark races out there.

The Grobb Cleaver is easily obtained is comparable to a shiny brass halberd
for damage but has 3 stat bonuses.

+3 str +3dex and +3 int....it might be AGL instead of DEX...not sure.

The cleaver is a 2 handed axe

-----Original Message-----
From: David Rogers <derogers334@...>
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 12:55 PM
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] weapons upgrade?


>From: David Rogers <derogers334@...>
>
>--- Trent Carroll <trent@...> wrote:
>> Right hand Dragoon Dirk (Lore, magic)
>> Left hand Tentacle Whip (magic)
>> I would like to upgrade the tentacle whip ...
>> The replacement weapon must do magic damage.
>
>Really hard. Unfortunately, there aren't very many
>magic weapon options. Here's the possibles:
>
>Combine Longsword: 6/28 0.214
>Combine Scimitar: 5/24 0.208
>PGT: 6/26 0.231
>Barbed Leather Whip: 7/28 0.250
>
>These are the most readily available options. There
>are other weapons that might be available to 30th
>level characters (both lootable and affordable), but
>they're much rarer. For example, I finally found
>someone wielding a Gladius (7/29 0.241) just over the
>past weekend. Others are reported but not commonly
>known where to locate, or commonly available on the
>markets.
>
>Piercing expands the field somewhat:
>
>Combine Rapier: 5/23 0.217
>Combine Spear: 6/27 0.222
>Dragoon Dirk: 6/23 0.261
>Ashenwood Spear: 6/22 0.272
>
>These are about as available as the 1hS options above,
>all in the vicinity of (or under) 300pp(ish).
>
>Kinda disappointing, huh? Once you look at it, there
>really *aren't* very many weapons available...
>
>===
>:D
> Dave's World
>-No matter where you go, there you are-
>"People will believe a lie either because they want to
>believe it's true, or because they fear it is." Wizard's
